title: In-Game Video Highlights - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device 
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives an In-Game Video Highlight notification

title: In-Game Video Highlights - Expanded (Shareable)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device with 3D Touch
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enable
custom_steps:
When a user receives a In-Game Video Highlights notification
and long presses a notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will open the Share sheet
and tapping will bring the user to Gameday for the game

and tapping will bring the user to Gameday Audio view
and the Gameday Audio feed will play
and tapping will open the MLB.TV stream for the game

title: In-Game Video Highlights - Expanded (Not Shareable)
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device with 3D Touch
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enable
custom_steps:
When a user receives a In-Game Video Highlights notification
and the video shareable flag is not set
and long presses a notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will bring the user to Gameday for the game

and tapping will bring the user to Gameday Audio view
and the Gameday Audio feed will play
and tapping will open the MLB.TV stream for the game

title: Condensed Game - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device 
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives a Condensed Game notification

title: Condensed Game - Expanded
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device with 3D Touch
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enable
custom_steps:
When a user receives a Condensed Game notification
and long presses a notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Video thumbnail
Play button
Headline
Duration (MM:SS)
Button for Watch in At Bat

custom_steps_separated.expected: and tapping will bring the user to Gameday Wrap for the game

title: Video Highlights
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and they are subscribed to a team's In-Game Video Highlights notification

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a video highlight notification
And the highlight should have "Video:" in the notification title

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps on the Video highlight notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Video Highlight should begin to play
And when the highlight is done the user should be left on At Bat's default screen (Generally Team page or Scoreboard)

title: Condensed Game
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is logged in with a paid account
and is subscribed to a team's Condensed Game notification

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should receive a video highlight notification
And the highlight should have "CG:" in the notification title

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps on the Condensed Game notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Video Highlight should begin to play
And when the highlight is done the user should be left on At Bat's default screen (Generally Team page or Scoreboard)

title: Notification Tray
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to push notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user expands a notification from the notification tray
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the notification should expand
and the user should be able to read the notification text in its entirety

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user swipes away an individual notification
Or clears all notifications
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the Notification should disappear
And the Notifications should NOT be 'ongoing' notifications

title: MLB News - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device 
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives an MLB News notification

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see MLB News then the editorial content
and a MLB logo

Example:

Title: MLB News
Body: {editorial content}

Then the user will see MLB News then the editorial content
and a MLB logo

Example:

Title: MLB News
Body: {editorial content}

title: MLB News - Expanded
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device with 3D Touch
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enable
custom_steps:
When a user receives a MLB News notification
and long presses a notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Thumbnail of Photo or Video (with Play button) with every news article
Headline
Duration in MM:SS (if Video ONLY)

title: Team News - Collapsed
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device 
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enabled
custom_steps: When a user receives an Team News notification

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see Team News then the editorial content
and team logo 

Example:

Title: {teamName} News
Body: {editorial content}

Then the user will see Team News then the editorial content
and team logo 

Example:

Title: {teamName} News
Body: {editorial content}

title: Team News - Expanded
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an iOS 10 device with 3D Touch
and has At Bat installed
and notifications enable
custom_steps:
When a user receives a Team News notification
and long presses a notification
custom_expected: Then the user will see the following from top to bottom

custom_steps_separated.content:
Thumbnail of Photo or Video (with Play button) with every news article
Headline
Duration in MM:SS (if Video ONLY)

title: MLB News
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to "MLB News" notifications

custom_steps_separated.content: Send MLB News Notification of a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps MLB News Notification of a news article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the URL that was sent with the MLB News Notification

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Send MLB News Notification of a video highlight
(usually begins with the word "Video")
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

custom_steps_separated.content: User taps MLB News Notification of a video highlight
custom_steps_separated.expected:
At Bat should open and the video highlight that was sent with the MLB News Notification should launch

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

title: Team News
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to a team's news notification

custom_steps_separated.expected: User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off

At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the URL that was sent with the Team News Notification

(If no URL was specified, the user should be left on the default At Bat screen)

title: Cut 4
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is subscribed to "Cut 4" notifications

custom_steps_separated.expected:
User should receive the notification and the content of the notification should not be truncated or cut off
and the text "Cut 4" should lead the notification text
At Bat should open and the user should be taken to the URL that was sent with the Cut 4 Notification
